summary: Economy encompasses various aspects of resource management, production, and distribution. This collection explores themes like decentralization, waste, blockchain, capitalism, and abundance. It delves into the complexities of modern economic systems, critiquing current manifestations of decentralization in blockchain and cryptocurrency. The content examines the interplay between scarcity and excess in capitalism, drawing on philosophical perspectives. It also highlights artistic practices that challenge conventional notions of value, waste, and the relationship between nature and culture.
excerpt: The article explores decentralization, excess, and waste in modern society. It critiques blockchain and cryptocurrency, examines scarcity and abundance in capitalism, and discusses how art challenges conventional notions of nature, culture, and waste.
